title: Grassland Gem Rush
description: Race to collect golden gems scattered across a grassland map. Avoid trees and rocks. First to 10 gems wins!
controls: Left stick / WASD to move. Collect gems by running into them.
howToPlay: Collect golden gems! First to 10 wins, or highest score when time runs out. Avoid water, trees, and rocks.
_note: This example uses colored rectangles as primitives. Real games will reference assets from the catalog.
